notes: [Improved] Separate `commentDate` into its own field rather than deriving it from `dateCreated` (#81) (thanks @michaelrog).
[Improved] Add event listener to clean up structure on uninstall (#82) (thanks @michaelrog).
[Fixed] Add foreign key so CommentRecords will track their associated ElementRecords (#83) (thanks @michaelrog).
[Fixed] Minor fix for sidebar icon.
[Added] Verbb marketing (new plugin icon, readme, etc).
[Added] Add plugin settings variable.
[Improved] Improved `onTrashComment` and `onBeforeTrashComment` events.
[Improved] Swap comment output macro for native `{% nav %}` tag - better supports element queries such as level.
[Fixed] Fixed template error for permissions settings for Craft Personal/Client versions.
[Fixed] Fixed `EntryModel.owner` issue where checking for non-entry elements being commented on.
[Added] Added ability to disable spam checks.
[Fixed] Fixed support for adding comments to non-entry elements.
[Fixed] Fixed typo in edit comment controller action.
[Added] Added support to permanently delete comment from within the CP.
[Added] Added user permissions to allow edit or trash of comments for other users.
[Added] Added `canEdit()` and `canTrash()` method to Comment Model.
[Improved] Changed current 'delete' terminology to 'trashed', which is technically more correct.
[Improved] `onBeforeDeleteComment` event changed to `onBeforeTrashComment`.
[Improved] `onDeleteComment` event changed to `onTrashComment`.
[Improved] `deleteActionUrl` template action is now `trashActionUrl`.
[Improved] `comments/delete` controller action is now `comments/trash`. Raises a deprecation notice.
[Improved] Commenting permissions now only support native Craft elements.
[Fixed] Fixed case where another logged in user could edit/save/delete comments from another user.
[Fixed] Fixed permissions errors when checking for elements.
[Fixed] Fixed issue with comments index showing comment id, not user name.
[Fixed] Move Save Comment button above content on edit comment page (for consistent Craft behaviour).
[Added] Permissions to control when elements are comment-able.
[Added] New fieldtype to provide element-specific control on commenting.
[Added] Added support for [craft.spamguard](https://github.com/selvinortiz/craft.spamguard).
[Fixed] Fixed error in comments element index - introduced in 0.4.2.
[Added] Added `element` attribute to CommentModel.
[Added] Added `parent` attribute to CommentModel.
[Added] Added `comment` attribute to FlagModel.
[Added] Added `user` attribute to FlagModel.
[Added] Added `comment` attribute to VoteModel.
[Added] Added `user` attribute to VoteModel.
[Improved] Code formatting.
[Added] Added `author` attribute to CommentModel.
[Added] Added `isGuest()` method to CommentModel.
[Added] Added email notifications for element authors and for other commenters when replying.
[Improved] Comments are now a little tidier in the element index table.
[Improved] Filter via Status in control panel.
[Added] Craft 2.5+ support, including release feed and icons.
[Added] Comments can now be edited through the front-end.
[Added] Added support for querying comments via votes
[Improved] Reorganise settings pages - separate flag/voting.
[Improved] Flagging comments and voting can be enabled/disabled altogether.
[Improved] Comments now require moderation by default.
[Improved] Lots of refactoring and reorganising.
[Improved] Removed Comments fieldtype.
[Improved] Comments are shown in hierarchical structure when in control panel.
[Improved] Full ajax and non ajax support for endpoints.
[Improved] Renamed `comments/add` to `comments/save`.
[Fixed] Fixed `comments/edit` endpoint to include validation/security.
# Templates
[Improved] Simplified and improved templates for single template tag.
[Improved] Simplified example code for ajax and non ajax handling.
[Improved] Comment forms handle validation properly, actual error messages and remembers text on validation.
# Hooks
[Added] Added `onBeforeSaveComment` hook.
[Added] Added `onSaveComment` hook.
[Added] Added `onBeforeDeleteComment` hook.
[Added] Added `onDeleteComment` hook.
[Added] Added `onBeforeFlagComment` hook.
[Added] Added `onFlagComment` hook.
[Added] Added `onBeforeVoteComment` hook.
[Added] Added `onVoteComment` hook.
Fixes for field settings messing things up. **Notice** The Comments fieldtype will soon be removed in favour of centralized permissions.
Other bugfixes and improvements.
Ensure works well on Craft Client/Craft Personal.
Added the ability to get total comments per element id using `{{ craft.comments.total(elementId) }}`.

Added security measures. You can now provide values to check against _all_ attributes of a comment and action accordingly. Comments can be marked as pending, spam, or simply not allowed to be submitted. See [Security](https://github.com/verbb/comments/wiki/Security)
Support sorting comments by votes.
Added optional flood-control settings. Enforces minimum time to wait between posts. Works for anonymous and logged-in users.
Added Schema Tags to templates (see [#19](https://github.com/verbb/comments/issues/19)).
Added threshold for downvotes - if over specified limit, `isPoorlyRated` will be true.
Comments can be set to auto-close after a defined amount of days since the elements creation.
Altered settings pane - now with multiple tabs.
Updated permissions UI.
Comments can be closed, disabling editing, deleting and replies. Accessible through `isClosed`.
Added basic sharing comment options. Provides permalink, Twitter and Facebook sharing.
Organise examples seperately. Better testing locally (symlinks).
Added standard, non-Ajax example.
Cleanup Ajax example - refactor.
Checked all routes perform either via Ajax, or standard POST.
Added edit/delete (trashing) for users. Anonymous users can't do either.
Added new set of templates for different comment statuses, allowing different templates for pending, approved, trashed and spam comments.
Cleaned up comments UI to include dropdown options. Better user-handling.
Alter Ajax example, ajax for voting, flagging, editing, deleting.
Fixed, users could vote on their own comments.
Fixed, remove voting arrows when unable to vote.
Added `canVote`, `canUpVote`, `canDownVote` variables for better handling in templates. Checks are also done server-side.
Some serious spelling mistakes for voting functions :)
Added back `voteCount`.
Seperated plugin settings to its own 'real' tab. Bad UX being directed off to plugin settings, then being redirected to plugins screen.
Added Permissions to control elements (and element types) comments are allowed to be made on. More convenient/centralised that custom field for each element.
Preserve comment formatting. Changed comment field to textarea in templates.

Comments have access to objects for [flags](https://github.com/verbb/comments/wiki/Comment-ElementType#flags) and [votes](https://github.com/verbb/comments/wiki/Comment-ElementType#votes). Removed flagCount and votesCount in favour of using `length` Twig filter.
Added support for comments to be made on any element type (entries, users, assets, etc).
Added support for voting on comments.
Added support for flagging inappropriate comments.
After set amount of flags made against a comment, the 'isFlagged' property on the comment is true. Configurable through settings.
Initial beta release.
